node.title: Three children injured in car crash on Auckland's North Shore
node.description: Police say the children have moderate injuries and have been taken to hospital.
node.content:
["Police have confirmed three children were injured after a car crashed into a building in the Auckland suburb of Browns Bay this morning.", "", "
Investigations into the incident, in which three children were injured, are underway. Photo: RNZ / Patrice Allen
", "They are still investigating how it happened but one line of inquiry is whether the driver of the car hit the accelerator rather than the brake.", "The incident is thought to have happened outside a small school on Anzac Road.", "Police said the children had moderate injuries and had been taken to hospital."]
